answers.answer: This is not likely a thyroid issue -- with these symtpoms, you need to work with your doctor or ask him/her to refer you to a specialty center/university to help figure out why you feel this way.

question: dr i have been choking and hoarse for 2 months throat hurts in back of neck ears feel swollen and cannt swallow it feels like my lungs are full i am scared cause no one can find out what is wrong. can u help before i choke to death.also am hungry. thk u i have diabetes.
title: chocking
